description: SWIO RAFI Madagascar Tropical Cyclone windfield

events.description: MDG TC Windfield 10yr event sustained wind (m/s)

footprints._cf1_fp_data_query: ST_SetSRID(ST_Point(lon,lat), 4326) AS the_geom, i1min_10yr AS intensity FROM paul.tc_wind
ST_SetSRID(ST_Point(lon,lat), 4326) AS the_geom, i10min_10yr AS intensity FROM paul.tc_wind
ST_SetSRID(ST_Point(lon,lat), 4326) AS the_geom, i3sec_10yr AS intensity FROM paul.tc_wind
